intro: Bonjour! I'm a passionate Full Stack Web Developer. You can find here some of my experience and skills as well as a form to contact me. I am looking forward to meet you!

I live in Toulouse (France) with my wife and son. I love playing Squash, Tennis and Basketball. I also like reading books, watching movies and TV shows and playing video games (but who doesn't? ðŸ˜„).
